title: Touchstone Pictures
summary: Touchstone Pictures was an American film distribution label of Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures, created and owned by The Walt Disney Company. Feature films released under the Touchstone label were produced and financed by The Walt Disney Studios, and featured more mature themes targeted towards adult audiences than typical Disney releases.[4][5] As such, Touchstone was merely a brand of the studio and did not exist as a distinct business operation.[1]
